home.title: Les Étoiles du Rocher
home.subtitle: Live in luxury and comfort
home.description: An exceptional 500m² villa nestled between sky and sea, offering an incomparable luxury experience on the French Riviera.

service.title: Tailored Service
service.description: Every stay at Les Étoiles du Rocher is a unique experience, with personalized service to meet your most demanding desires.

kitchen.noPoints: Click on one of the points to see specific details about this part of the kitchen.

cabinets.title: Upper and Lower Cabinets
cabinets.description: Upper cabinets with invisible fixings and satin glass in the center, raised lower cabinets with two shelves and 15% extra space.

counter.title: Countertop and Backsplash
counter.description: Black quartz countertop with contrasting matte finish, tempered glass backsplash for easy cleaning.

sink.title: Sink and Faucet
sink.description: Undermount stainless steel sink with pull-out faucet with variable flow for more flexibility.

dishwasher.title: Smart Dishwasher
dishwasher.description: Integrated dishwasher with eco program and automatic load detection for optimized consumption.

fridge.title: Combined Refrigerators
fridge.description: Combined refrigerator-freezer with No-Frost compartments and special fresh zone for sensitive foods.

oven.title: Oven and Microwave
oven.description: Multifunction oven with steam function and combined microwave for quick and healthy cooking.

stove.title: Cooktop
stove.description: Induction cooktop with 5 cooking zones and variable bridge to adapt to all types of pots.

island.title: Central Island
island.description: Central island with integrated storage space and hidden electrical outlets for more convenience.

exterior.alt: Villa exterior with pool and sea view

living.alt: Luxury living room with glass doors

master.title: Master Suite
master.description: A spacious master suite with panoramic sea view, marble bathroom and walk-in closet.

main.title: Main Living Room
main.description: An elegant living room with glass doors offering an incomparable view of the Mediterranean.

terrace.title: Terrace & Pool
terrace.description: A vast terrace with infinity pool and relaxation area with sea view.

gourmet.title: Gourmet Kitchen
gourmet.description: A fully equipped kitchen with central island and high-end appliances.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Discover Les Étoiles du Rocher through our photo gallery

discover.title: Discover
discover.subtitle: Explore the wonders of the French Riviera from Les Étoiles du Rocher.

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.subtitle: A multitude of activities to make your stay unforgettable.

monaco.title: Monaco
monaco.description: Discover the Principality of Monaco, its legendary casinos, the Prince's Palace and the Formula 1 Grand Prix.

nice.title: Nice
nice.description: Stroll along the Promenade des Anglais, visit Old Nice and savor the local gastronomy.

eze.title: Èze Village
eze.description: Medieval perched village with breathtaking views of the Mediterranean and the famous Exotic Garden.

saintPaul.title: Saint-Paul-de-Vence
saintPaul.description: Artists' village with art galleries, ramparts and the Maeght Foundation.

menton.title: Menton
menton.description: The pearl of France, known for its gardens, the lemon festival and its beaches.

antibes.title: Antibes
antibes.description: Discover Port Vauban, Fort Carré and the Picasso Museum in this historic city.
